aircraft.value: Cerberus Defense - AC-9996-216 at Regional Depot-C

defect_observed.value: Outflow valve control malfunction. Anomaly detected during routine inspection.

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Air Conditioning component. Functional testing confirmed the reported anomaly.

corrective_action.value: Implement enhanced testing protocol before component installation

remarks_investigation.value: Investigation completed as per established procedures. All findings documented.

remarks_design.value: Technical evaluation completed. Proposed preventive measures are appropriate and align with design intent. Date: 08/09/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Eng. K.N. Iyer

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Quality control procedures verified. Recommend periodic surveillance of manufacturing facility. Date: 11/09/2023 Signature: Air Cmde S.B. Rao

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) User perspective considered. Recommend update to operating procedures based on lessons learned. Date: 13/09/2023 Signature: Sqn Ldr V.K. Patel

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Regulatory quality requirements verified. Proposed actions meet airworthiness standards. Recommend approval. Date: 12/09/2023 Signature: Dr. S.M. Kulkarni

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) From regulatory standpoint, investigation meets required standards. Approve proposed corrective actions. Date: 15/09/2023 Signature: Gp Capt N.R. Kumar

Centre for Military Airworthiness and Certification
FORM - 44
DEFECT INVESTIGATION REPORT FORMAT
Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Critical
b) Defect Observed: Outflow valve control malfunction. Anomaly detected during routine inspection.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Age-related degradation of elastomeric components
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Air Conditioning component. Functional
testing confirmed the reported anomaly.
c) Remedial Measures Implement enhanced testing protocol before component installation
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Establish periodic calibration schedule
d) Attributable Code: NFF - No Failure Found
Remarks: Investigation completed as per established procedures. ...
